name: Project Pig
description:
PROJECT PIG

Project Pig is a retro arcade shooter, inspired by games such as Vlambeer's 'Nuclear Throne' and Dodge Roll's 'Enter the Gungeon'. Improve to get new highscores, all the while unlocking a cast of playable characters

Dash around the arena, picking up new guns and avoiding the dozens of bullets flying around. With 18 different guns to play with, gameplay stays fresh and new, and each game is different

This game if for those who want a fun experience while staying constantly challenging.

Please feel free to rate, comment, ask a question, or suggest something

You can email me at: omnipotentindie@gmail.com

Find my itch.io page at: https://omnipotentindie.itch.io/

Find my twitter at: https://twitter.com/OmnipotentIndie

-CONTROLS-

WASD to move/navigate menu

Space to dash/restart/menu select

Left click to shoot
